title: Sophie Turner Gets A Birthday Shoutout From Millie Bobby Brown - Sophie Turner Turns 21 Today
text:
Stranger Things meets Game of Thrones in Millie Bobby Brown's birthday wish to Sophie Turner. The starlet‚Äîwho just turned 13 on Sunday‚Äîtook to Instagram today to share a cute photo with her fellow actress from the SAG Awards a few weeks ago. "Happy birthday to the coolest girl I know! Thank you for being such a great role model! Love you Soph," she captioned the shot.
Happy birthday to the coolest girl I know! Thank you for being such a great role model! Love you Soph ‚ù§Ô∏èüòò @sophiet
A post shared by Millie Bobby Brown (@milliebobbybrown) on Feb 21, 2017 at 7:30am PST
 The Game of Thrones actress, who turns 21 today, is also a big fan Brown's character, Eleven. She told Entertainment Weekly on the Emmy's red carpet, "Oh my God, she's amazing. How is this happening? There are, like, 12-year-old kids who are ten times better than all the adults. They're showing us all up. It's embarrassing." Turner also got her start as a young actress‚Äîshe began her role as Sansa Stark on Game of Thrones when she was just fifteen years old.
